snippet: Mali has no cases of the Ebola virus now that the last patient in the country has recovered and left a hospital, the Ministry of Health said Thursday.
abstract: Mali's Ministry of Health reports that no cases of Ebola virus have emerged since last patient in country recovered and left hospital.
lead_paragraph: Mali has no cases of the Ebola virus now that the last patient in the country has recovered and left a hospital, the Ministry of Health said Thursday.

headline.main: Mali: No Ebola Cases, Ministry Says
headline.print_headline: Mali: No Ebola Cases, Ministry Says
